name: Make Way (For The King)
description:
This game was created for SEA Game Jam 2021 in just 48 hours by team of two. 
Currently the game can only be played by Xbox Controller. 

Credits: 
Programmer - Joshua Chung
Artist and Designer - Suan Goh

Music by Eric Matyas
